item.title: conference report : ACCU2019
item.description: Conference Report: ACCU 2019 Link to heading I had the pleasure to attend to the ACCU2019 in Bristol which was my first cpp centred conference (the first of a long series I hope :p) and it was amazing in a different aspect. It is a 4 days conference that occurs every year between March and April in the Marriott hotel in Bristol. Amazing people, very inclusive and easy to talk to everyone!
